reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress beautiful and well-made, appreciating its perfect length and true-to-size fit. Customers mention the dress is heavier than expected.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Heavy but beautiful dress!
items.body: Bought this for my friends wedding and it’s very cute! Measurements are very accurate, the dress is pretty heavy with all of the material but very worth it! Hoping the straps will keep up with the material Read more
items.author: Hallie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect dress
items.body: Night out, look no more. This was so flattering and cute. Everything on this dress was perfect Read more
items.author: Ashley Kinney

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful for any occasion.
items.body: This is the most beautiful dress. I wore this for my maternity photos, and it was perfect. I also love that I can still wear it now since it isn’t a maternity dress. Amazing for the price. Read more
items.author: Em Rose

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not for big boobs
items.body: This dress is beautiful! The skirt is thicker (not see through at all) the layers do make it a bit heavy. The details are all very pretty! 3 stars because the straps on the dress are very flimsy, it may as well be a strapless dress, because the strap/sleeves do not do anything to keep the dress up. So, if you have a bigger chest (I am 38D), this dress will not work for you. If you have a smaller chest it would probably be very flattering! Read more
items.author: cass

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous! Adore this dress!
items.body: Beautiful dress, true to size and perfect for a spring or summer wedding. I am 5’10 and the dress was the perfect length for me. I received many compliments a the wedding. Purchased from actual website and Amazon, Amazon shipping was faster and quality was the same. Dress is very comfortable and easy to style. You cannot wear a bra with it so you will need to plan for that. Highly recommend. Love the blue one too! Read more
items.author: WildcatInKnox

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress
items.body: Very cute overall but I am 5.4 and it was a bit too long for me. And the dress is heavier than I expected so the weight pulls it a bit so it feels awkward on the top Read more
items.author: Yana Kyryliuk

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Petal & Pup Womens Belle Maxi Dress Size: large
items.body: Beautiful!! I put it in the dryer for a few minutes and the wrinkles came out perfectly. 5’7” 185 I got size large. Plenty of stretch in the top. Read more
items.author: LA

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars BUY IT
items.body: Buy the dress. It is ABSOLUTELY worth it. It is insanely comfortable. The quality is amazing. It is true to size. I order a size large and it fits PERFECT. I typically wear a size 12. I’m 5’4” and 190 lbs. It is the perfect length on me as well. Read more
items.author: Trinity Werning

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Off-white, Blush, Blue, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
